item.title: How to list all the configuration settings in a Ceph cluster monitor?
item.description: It can be really helpful to have a single command to list all the configuration settings in a monitor node, in a Ceph cluster. This is possible by interacting directly with the monitor’s unix socket file. This can be found under /var/run/ceph/. By default, the admin socket for the monitor will be in the path /var/run/ceph/ceph-mon..asok. The default location can vary in case you have defined it to be a different one, at the time of the installation.
